name: Mermaid Shores
description:
A summer visit to your aunt’s home leads to a very memorable encounter with an unforgettable merboy. When the two of you reconnect many years later, you realize a little too late that handsome mermen aren’t the only secrets that lie within the ocean’s depths…

Features:

  • Customizable genders for the protagonist.
  • 22,000+ words.
  • 3 Endings.
  • 9 CGs.
  • 16 Original BGs.
